channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description:
This is the last thing i need, currently i have npc's added, but i do not know how to change the hp or anything.
when i spawn it , it has no drops, and 1 hp, can someone help me please
i have searched every where, and found nothing, please help.

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

config.java to change the xp rates I think.
You need to add drops and the drop rate into the .cfg file called NPCDROPS(I think its called that), you need to define the stats and the hp level in some other cfg file can’t remember what one.
Assuming its Pi anyways.

Read full topic
